original_title: 第七官界彷徨 尾崎翠を探して
overview: A drama depicting the world of the female writer Midori Osaki in three parts: the dramatic creation of her masterpiece, "Wanderings in the Realm of the Seventh Sense," her unknown years spent in poor health and poverty, and the present-day world from which we see her work.
title: In Search of a Lost Writer: Wandering in the World of the Seventh Sense
